pr_title: managed attribute country code for org

timeline.message: managed attribute country code for org

timeline.bodyText:
typo: orgnasation -> organisation
This test is for testing the validation of country code updating only being allowed by RIPE NCC, not for the attribute being flagged as managed?
timeline.author: sbusk

replies.bodyText:
I see the test case tests specifically that country code value can only be changed by RIPE NCC.
Can you add a test also where you do authenticate as RIPE and change the attribute value?
replies.author: sbusk

replies.bodyText: There is separate test case to test that country code is shown as managed attribute  for organisation (validate_country_managed_attribute_only_for_organisation) and not as managed attribute for other object type.
replies.author: maggarwal13

replies.bodyText: I will add a test case that country code can be updated using overrides
replies.author: maggarwal13

timeline.bodyText:
This validation is already done in CountryRipeMaintainedValidator.java. If you add it here also, there may be duplicate error messages in the response.
I don't mind if you want to move it here for consistency, but then please delete the other validator.
timeline.author: eshryane

timeline.message:
Merge branch 'country_managed_attribute' of github.com:RIPE-NCC/whois into country_managed_attribute

* 'country_managed_attribute' of github.com:RIPE-NCC/whois:
  Bump springockito-annotations from 1.0.5 to 1.0.9 (#698)
  Bump log4j.version from 2.13.2 to 2.14.0 (#697)
  Sonar coverage (#690)
